question_text: Which of the following statements about APIPA is TRUE?
answer_options: It can be used to access the internet
It provides address conflict resolution using ARP
It allows devices to communicate across different subnets
It is commonly used in IPv6 networks
correct_answer: It provides address conflict resolution using ARP
explanation: APIPA uses ARP to ensure the randomly assigned address isnâ€™t already in use on the subnet.
